author: alerei
title: Great model!
review: I remember seeing this set at a friend's as a young boy, probably in 96 or 97, and knew I had to get one! Travelled with the Color Line ferries several times after that, and never saw the set. Some years later it was again in the tax free store and I was thrilled! Looks just like the real thing, which I think most likely is a Color Line ferry named Christian IV. I am not sure if it still operates. Opening mechanism at the back is great. Two miniature cars inside.
